data.title: Bus Fribourg to Berlin
data.meta_description: ✔ Cheap trip from Fribourg to Berlin ✔ Secure online payment ✔ Free Wi-Fi and plug sockets on board ✔ 2 pieces of luggage ✔ Biggest European network!
data.text:
Which destinations can I reach from Berlin with FlixBus?

With FlixBus, you can conveniently reach 409 destinations from Berlin, including Hamburg, Frankfurt, Munich.

Are night bus trips available from Fribourg to Berlin?

Yes, night trip options are available from Fribourg to Berlin. Check out the route's schedule and choose the best option to suit your plans!

How much does it cost to take a bike on the bus from Fribourg to Berlin?

You can bring your bike on FlixBus from Fribourg to Berlin subject to availability. You can find the prices for bikes here.

How much is the bus ticket between Fribourg and Berlin?

You can get from Fribourg to Berlin for as little as 68,99 €. Take advantage of our best deals on FlixBus tickets by traveling off-peak and during the week. You can buy your ticket from Fribourg to Berlin most easily on this website or in the app.

Where can I see if my bus from Fribourg to Berlin is on time?

When traveling from Fribourg to Berlin, you can track your bus location on our Real-Time Bus Tracker. Just select the relevant bus stop and check the time of arrival. Find out where your bus is and check if there are delays on the route.

How can I pay for my bus ticket from Fribourg to Berlin?

We offer several payment methods for purchasing your ticket from Fribourg to Berlin securely. You can choose among card payment, PayPal, Google Pay and many more. Once in the payment section, you will be able to see all the available options and pick your preferred one. If you are having difficulties with payment, check out our help page about payments. If you buy your bus ticket onboard or at a sales point you are also given the option to pay cash.

How much luggage can I bring on the bus from Fribourg to Berlin?

Passengers traveling from Fribourg to Berlin can bring one checked luggage and one piece of hand luggage for free. If you want to carry additional or special luggage, you can check all the options available on this page.

How much is a children's bus ticket from Fribourg to Berlin?

The price of a children's bus ticket from Fribourg to Berlin depends on the age of the child and the time of booking. Children under the age of 15 receive a discount on the regular adult fare. At the time of booking, we calculate the cheapest price for you from all available rates and discounts. If the discounted price is lower than the child fare, the selected passengers pay the same price. Please, make sure you check our child travel and seat policy. Strollers and foldable pushchairs (width + length + height = max 240 cm) can be transported in the luggage compartment of the bus free of charge.

Are the bus from Fribourg to Berlin equipped for passengers with reduced mobility?

Yes, all FlixBus buses from Fribourg to Berlin are equipped for passengers with reduced mobility. We strive to make our buses as comfortable and accessible as possible for people with disabilities and limited mobility. Service animals are allowed on board all FlixBus buses traveling from Fribourg to Berlin. The transportation of wheelchairs, foldable wheelchairs, walking aid and other assistive mobility devices is free of charge.

Is traveling by bus from Fribourg to Berlin environmentally-friendly?

Traveling by bus from Fribourg to Berlin is one of the most environmentally-friendly options available as it reduces traffic associated emissions, and passengers can offset their carbon emissions when they travel with FlixBus by clicking the CO₂ compensation box when booking their ticket.

What onboard services are available on buses from Fribourg to Berlin?

FlixBus buses traveling from Fribourg to Berlin offer extra legroom, private outlets, and restrooms. Most buses also provide free Wi-Fi.

What is the earliest FlixBus ride from Fribourg to Berlin?

The earliest FlixBus ride from Fribourg to Berlin departs at 12:55.

What is the latest FlixBus ride from Fribourg to Berlin?

The latest FlixBus ride from Fribourg to Berlin departs at 21:35.

How many bus stations are there in Fribourg?

There is one bus station in Fribourg; Fribourg (Poya). You can find its location on the map on his page.

How many bus stations are there in Berlin?

There are 9 bus stations in Berlin; Berlin (Ostbahnhof), Berlin Alexanderplatz, Berlin Alt-Tegel (metro station), Berlin Central Station (Invalidenstraße), Berlin S-Treptower Park (Puschkinallee), Berlin Südkreuz train station, Berlin Wannsee (Wannsee station), Berlin central bus station, Berlin zoo train station. You can find the location of the stations on the map on this page.
